quests.description: Download pieces of Paradigm's encrypted message from Data Beacons

quests.description: Decode Paradigm's message at one of her Terminals

quests.description: Retrieve a box of Refined Materials
quests.shortDescription: We're looking for a big box of special rocks. When you see it, grab it. - AMIE

quests.description: Place the box of Refined Material at Shattered Slabs
quests.shortDescription: You heard the Paradigm. Take this big box full of rocks to the big pit full of rocks! - AMIE
